messages.title: Dear Elector
messages.content: We're just a few weeks away from a general election. This should be a time of national excitement, but the truth is that a lot of people are completely fed up with politics. They think things will stay the same whoever gets in. If you feel that way I don't blame you. But I'm writing to tell you things can change - together we can change Britain and make life better.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Bringing in transparent government, smashing open the secrecy and shining a light on how your money gets spent.
To create jobs and grow the economy by supporting people to start their own businesses and get the youth into employment.
Radically reforming the welfare system and involving voluntary groups and charities to help personalise aid.
Helping people through welfare reform to get a job, starting businesses, and supporting first time job seekers.
Making it happen by scrapping Stamp Duty for most first-time buyers.
Protecting you from unfair tax hikes. Labour are planning a tax on jobs that will hit millions in the pocket - so we'll cut Labour waste to stop it.

issues.economy: To get the economy moving, support for people to start their own businesses and helping youth into their first jobs.
issues.governance: Transparent government, smashing open the secrecy and shining a light on how money is spent.
issues.socialWelfare: Radically reforming the welfare system, involving voluntary groups and charities to help personalise aid.

housing.content: Making it happen by scrapping Stamp Duty for most first-time buyers.

quotes.text: The choice at this election is clear... Don't miss your chance to vote for that change.

images.caption: David Cameron, Leader of the Conservative Party
